release_notes.en-US: Version 3.1. 1) At disabled/removed from Add-ons Manager, task view are restored to default modes. 2) New event button was added. 3) New task button was added. 4) X-small button in font size was added. 5) X-large button in font size was added. 6) Category button in task view was added. 7) MarkCompleted button in task view was added. 8) Priority button in task view was added. 9) Print option was added (convert item to message). November 25 2020. From Sungho Hwang.

description.en-US: Version 3.1. updated in 2020-11-27. 1) At disabled/removed from Add-ons Manager, task view are restored to default modes. 2) New event button was added. 3) New task button was added. 4) X-small button in font size was added. 5) X-large button in font size was added. 6) Category button in task view was added. 7) MarkCompleted button in task view was added. 8) Priority button in task view was added. 9) Print option was added (convert item to message). If button texts were not aligned, please, change default font and size. If coupling with TaskDescriptions, it is good enough! Please, use browserAction to put it at tabs toolbar in where browserAction is pinned. Executed well. To Hyun-geol who I like.
